title: F/S - Seven T206 EPDG and Cycle, includes HOF - reduced $225 obo

posts.post_title: F/S - Seven T206 EPDG and Cycle, includes HOF - reduced $225 obo
posts.post_content:
Last price reduction... moving to Ebay on Friday.  Asking $200 OBO delivered for the seven card lot:
Cycle 350: Beckley (HOF), Brain, Hinchman
El Principe De Gales: Kling, Leach, Ritchey Steinfeldt
